titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-03-31 - Part 1

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 31, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performer Red Sovine (although Goldie Hill was advertised as the guest for this week on the previous show), and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Louie Dunn, Lew Childre, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
